name: _Blue
description:
_Blue is an arcade, low spec platforming game where every level has something new added to it.

Currently the game has 25 available levels to it but will be soon updated to include 50 levels, this is a DLC of some sort

v1.1 Release Date: TBA
Current Version: v1.0.2

Thanks for dropping by, much appreciated :D
Hope you have a good day!
~CheesyKnobCodee
